TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientOperation extends System.Object

summary.span: 用於修改或擴充用戶端物件或用戶端通道物件中特定合約作業的執行行為。

span.span: Used to modify or extend the execution behavior of a specific contract operation in a client object or client channel object.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端執行階段修改的位置以及範圍僅限一項服務作業之自訂擴充的插入點，就是 類別。The class is the location for client run-time modifications and insertion point for custom extensions that are scoped to only one service operation. (若要修改合約中的所有訊息的用戶端執行階段行為，請使用類別。(To modify client run-time behavior for all messages in a contract, use the class. )) 使用自訂用戶端行為物件，這個物件的型別可以是 (用來尋找要修改的特定作業) 或 (可藉由建立自訂屬性加以套用)，即可安裝 修改。Install modifications using a custom client behavior object, either of type (to find a particular operation to modify) or of type (which can then be applied by creating a custom attribute). 您可以使用 屬性找出表示特定服務作業的 物件。Use the property to locate the object that represents a particular service operation. 如需有關用戶端和用戶端架構的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 WCF 用戶端存取服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client.md)並[WCF 用戶端架構](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-architecture.md)。For more information about clients and the client architecture, see [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client.md) and [WCF Client Architecture](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-architecture.md). 如需有關自訂用戶端執行階段的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充用戶端](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-clients.md)。For more information about customizing the client runtime, see [Extending Clients](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-clients.md). 如需使用行為的詳細資訊，請參閱[設定和擴充執行階段行為](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/configuring-and-extending-the-runtime-with-behaviors.md)。For more information about using behaviors, see [Configuring and Extending the Runtime with Behaviors](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/configuring-and-extending-the-runtime-with-behaviors.md). 您可以使用下列屬性來插入自訂物件或修改用戶端執行行為：The following properties enable you to insert custom objects or modify the client execution behavior: - 使用 屬性，即可插入作業的自訂 實作或修改目前的格式器。Use the property to insert a custom implementation for an operation or modify the current formatter. - 使用 屬性，即可插入自訂 實作或修改目前的實作。Use the property to insert a custom implementation or to modify the current one. - 使用 屬性，即可控制由誰來序列化傳出訊息。Use the property to control who serializes an outbound message. - 使用 屬性，即可控制由誰來還原序列化傳入訊息。Use the property to control who deserializes an inbound message. - 使用 屬性，即可存取要求訊息的 WS-Addressing 動作，而使用 屬性便可存取回應訊息動作。Use the property to access the WS-Addressing action of the request message and the property to access the response message action. - 使用 和 ，即可指定要與非同步作業產生關聯的用戶端方法。Use the and to specify which client methods are associated with an asynchronous operation. - 使用 屬性，即可取得可在 SOAP 錯誤中顯示為詳細類型之指定型別的集合。Use the property to get a collection of specified types that can appear in SOAP faults as the detail type. - 使用 和 屬性，即可分別控制在呼叫作業時是否要產生或卸除工作階段。Use the and properties to control whether a session is initiated or is torn down, respectively, when the operation is called. - 使用 屬性，即可控制用戶端是否要在完成引動之前等候回應。Use the property to control whether the client waits for a response before completing the invocation. - 使用 屬性，即可取得 包含物件。Use the property to obtain the containing object. - 使用 屬性，即可取得作業的名稱。Use the property to get the name of the operation. - 使用 屬性，即可控制要對應到作業的方法。Use the property to control which method is mapped to the operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範 如何將自訂參數偵測器插入至 屬性中的每個 。The following code example shows an inserting a custom parameter inspector into each in the property. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可控制格式器要從傳入訊息還原序列化該傳回值，或是要將傳入訊息直接傳回做為傳回值。Use the property to control whether the formatter deserializes the return value from an inbound message or whether the inbound message is returned directly as the return value. - **附註**如果`false`，傳回的類型必須是型別的而且不可以有 out 參數或會在執行階段擲回。**Note** If `false`, the return type must be of type and there can be no out parameters or an is thrown at run-time. 如果訊息為 `null`，則會在執行階段擲回 。If the message is `null`, a is thrown at run-time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可插入作業的自訂 實作或修改目前的格式器。Use the property to insert a custom implementation for an operation or modify the current formatter. 格式器的使用方式可以透過 和 屬性來控制。The use of the formatter can be controlled by the and properties. 介面會定義 和 方法，這些方法的用途分別是將一組物件參數轉換為訊息，以及從訊息轉換為一組傳回值。The interface defines the and methods, which are used to convert a set of object parameters to a message and from a message to a set of return values, respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可插入自訂 實作或修改目前的實作。Use the property to insert a custom implementation or to modify the current one. 參數偵測器會依照加入要求之集合的順序，以及依照回覆的相反順序叫用。Parameter inspectors are invoked in the order in which they are added to the collection for requests and in the reverse order for replies. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範 如何將自訂參數偵測器插入至 屬性中的每個 。The following code example shows an inserting a custom parameter inspector into each in the property. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可指出格式器是否將作業參數序列化為回覆訊息，或是判定第一個參數是否當做傳出訊息來傳送。Use the property to indicate whether the formatter serializes operation parameters into a reply message or to determine if the first parameter is sent as the outbound message. > [!NOTE] > 如果設定為 `false`，則作業必須剛好只有一個型別為 的參數，否則會擲回例外狀況。If set to `false`, the operation must have exactly one parameter of type or an exception is thrown.
